predicate.note: Frames file for 'stimulate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'spark'.

roleset.name: cause an increase (in interest, etc)

example.name: passive
example.text: Teikoku Oil, also stimulated *trace* by rumors of speculative buying, advanced 100 yen to 1,460.

example.name: active
example.text: Unless the Federal Reserve eases interest rates soon *trace* to stimulate the economy, profits could remain disappointing.

roleset.note: As in difficult cases like the second one above, it can be very difficult to distinguish between agents and instruments. So don't try. Only use the 'instrument' arg when there is also an 'agent' present, as in the following:

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John stimulated interest in his collection of bottle caps by throwing them at passers-by.
example.arg: interest in his collection of bottle caps
